# lavinmq_shovel (Resource)

Manage a shovel for message forwarding between queues and exchanges.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `dest_uri` (String) Destination AMQP URI (where messages are published to).
- `name` (String) Name of the shovel.
- `src_uri` (String) Source AMQP URI (where messages are consumed from).
- `vhost` (String) Virtual host where the shovel is defined.

### Optional

- `ack_mode` (String) When to acknowledge messages from source: 'on-confirm', 'on-publish', or 'no-ack'.
- `dest_exchange` (String) Name of destination exchange to publish to. Either dest_queue or dest_exchange must be specified.
- `dest_exchange_key` (String) Routing key for destination exchange publishing (only used with dest_exchange).
- `dest_queue` (String) Name of destination queue to publish to. Either dest_queue or dest_exchange must be specified.
- `reconnect_delay` (Number) Delay in seconds before reconnecting after connection failure.
- `src_delete_after` (String) When to delete messages from source: 'never' or 'queue-length'.
- `src_exchange` (String) Name of source exchange to consume from. Either src_queue or src_exchange must be specified.
- `src_exchange_key` (String) Routing key for source exchange binding (only used with src_exchange).
- `src_prefetch_count` (Number) Number of messages to prefetch from source.
- `src_queue` (String) Name of source queue to consume from. Either src_queue or src_exchange must be specified.
